summary: A lightweight ENB manager with enbseries/enblocal updating, automatic archive extraction, as well as multiple palette and depth of field support.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Â [/b][size=6][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]This is a simple and lightweight ENB manager written in C#.[/size]

[size=4]If you encounter any issues, please leave a comment letting me know. Thanks to everyone who has tested this out and given me excellent feedback already![/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Requires Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5[/size][/color]


[size=6][u][b]Installation[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]You can place the executable anywhere you'd like (preferably nested in its own folder as it will store all preset files in subfolders) but I do not recommend using the Program Files directory, as without correct read/write permissions to the directory the program may not work properly.[/size]


[size=6][u][b]Updating[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]As of the latest version (3.0.0.0), existing configurations from older version will NOT be detected. This is due to a completely different means of managing files and data. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.[/size]


[size=6][u][b]Changelog[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4][u][b]3.0.0.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Expanded global INI capabilities to allow any INI file to have global settings for each game[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added game-independent filesets to allow users to apply groups of files to presets of any game[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]UI improvements[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Revamped means of file and application data storage[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]2.1.3.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Improved generic (Other Config Files) INI update confirmation to show a list of all modified INIs, allowing for easier selection of which ones to update[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added functionality to backup existing files in the game directory that will be overwritten when a preset is enabled and restore those files once disabled[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Fixed bug that caused enblocal and enbseries files to not auto update properly[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Globals UI styling improvements[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]2.1.2.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Added generic update functionality that will check all INIs for changes (Game Options > Other Config Files)[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Fixed an issue where disabling globals disabled ability to modify auto-update settings[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Fixed a bug where the update available message would persist even after updating to the latest version[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]2.1.1.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Fixed a crash that occurred when adding a new binary from an archive[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]2.1.0.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Stability improvements[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Interface improvements[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added an automatic update check to notify of new ENB Man version (can be disabled)[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Improved global settings feature, added separate settings for enbseries.ini[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Depth of Fields can now include any files/subfolders[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added functionality to edit binary/depth of field files in the same manner as preset files[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added multiple drag/drop for palettes, will display each one when asked for a name[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]2.0.0.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Completely rewritten from the ground up. Multiple new features included.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.1.0.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Lots of changes, too many to list. Please see the "Usage" section above for all the features.[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.6.1[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Fixed bug causing custom palette to not work properly[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.6.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Fixed bug where sometimes files were not enabled properly[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added display of active ENB version and palette[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added relational lines between nodes of file list[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added feature that compares existing palettes to the one being added and notifies if the same palette already exists[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added right-click menu to file list allowing to add folders/files to the root/selected directory, open/rename/delete selected file/folder, and expand/collapse all folders[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added tooltips[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.5.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Switched file list from ListView to TreeView, will be improving this in future updates[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Better IOException handling (multiple bugs fixed)[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Better enblocal/enbseries update processing[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Palettes can now be added by dropping a single bitmap onto the palette image box[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.4.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Fixed issue where window didn't gain focus after dropping files into the file list[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Fixed issue where cancelling the file selection dialog for binary versions still attempted to add it to the collection[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Fixed issue causing null keys in PresetData.ini[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.3.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Added palette selection feature[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Fixed a few minor layout issues[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added some exception handling to important events[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Application now only allows one instance[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.2.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Added feature to copy presets[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Added version number in bottom right corner[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Minor code optimizations[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.1.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Fixed directory recursion to allow more than one level of sub-directories[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Window now recalls last position/size/state[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Switched from 64-bit to 32-bit[/size][/*]
[*][size=4]Fixed issue generating unnecessary .ini file in Presets directory[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=4][u][b]1.0.0.0[/b][/u][/size]
[list][*][size=4]Initial Release[/size][/*]
[/list]

[size=6][u][b]Permissions[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]I only ask that you not distribute this to other sites. Just link to this page.[/size]
author: Casmithy

Added functionality to backup existing files in the game directory that will be overwritten when a preset is enabled and restore those files once disabled
Fixed bug that caused enblocal and enbseries files to not auto update properly

Added game-independent filesets to allow users to apply groups of files to presets of any game
UI improvements
